reviewText: I love this collection.  It allowed me to purchase two movies I thoroughly enjoy (The Lake House/Youve Got Mail) and familiarized me with one I had not seen (The Phantom of the Opera).  All three at at an afforable price.  This is a great way to add to your DVD collection.
Here are three movies for the hopeless romantics out there. Good titles for a rainy day or special evening at home. Don't forget the chardonnay,chocolate,and fresh cut flowers!
Great, for movies to watch over & over!
I do not have this set specifically, but have seen all these movies.  They are all of good quality and acting. Wonderful and romantic stories.  :)
You can't go wrong with this three-in-one film selection. All three are well-done and enjoyable--I never get tired of them! A great value on Amazon. Thanks!

Great for a girls night occasion.  All three are wonderfully acted and told. Even my husband loved them all.!
Everyone should own.

My favorite thing about this three movies set is that each one is on a separate dvd disk in its own protective sleeve made to hold a dvd disk. The whole package is compact and takes up less room for storage than 3 separate dvd cases would. Also the price  is fabulous! 3 movies for the price of one! Last but not least, is the variety that spans some years of movie making and it's not a boring set. Ro

I love the fact that these were all packaged together and had just what I wanted in them.  The package titled Ramance Collection has three of the best films made that I like The Lake House, Phantom of the Opera, and You've Got Mail. What could be better than to give this as a gift as well?

Collection of movies in this set is really good.  I bought several of these DVDs for Christmas gifts and all the recipients were very happy.  Seller delivered on time and product arrived in perfect condition.
